snippet.title: Aurora: The Lost Medallion - The Cave | Official Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Aurora: The Lost Medallion - The Cave - Demo Teaser Trailer. An epic coming-of-age tale of destiny, friendship, and discovery in a unique sci-fi world.
